languages.text: "В тот же момент, когда мы пришвартуемся в одном из доков Футфола. Конечно, если династия фон Валанциус заинтересована в служении {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Золотому Трону{/g}... как тому и положено быть".

traits.locale_text: "В тот же момент, когда мы пришвартуемся в одном из доков Футфола. Конечно, если династия фон Валанциус заинтересована в служении {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Золотому Трону{/g}... как тому и положено быть".
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "As soon as we dock on Footfall. That's assuming, of course, that the von Valancius dynasty is committed to serving the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g}... as it should be."
languages.original_text: "В тот же момент, когда мы пришвартуемся в одном из доков Футфола. Конечно, если династия фон Валанциус заинтересована в служении {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Золотому Трону{/g}... как тому и положено быть".

traits.locale_text: "As soon as we dock on Footfall. That's assuming, of course, that the von Valancius dynasty is committed to serving the Golden Throne... as it should be."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "As soon as we dock on Footfall. That's assuming, of course, that the von Valancius dynasty is committed to serving the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g}... as it should be."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “只要我们在落脚港靠了岸，我就离开。当然，离开的前提是，冯·瓦兰修斯王朝致力于侍奉{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}黄金王座{/g}……它也理当如此。”
languages.original_text: "As soon as we dock on Footfall. That's assuming, of course, that the von Valancius dynasty is committed to serving the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g}... as it should be."

traits.locale_text: “只要我们在落脚港靠了岸，我就离开。当然，离开的前提是，冯·瓦兰修斯王朝致力于侍奉{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}黄金王座{/g}……它也理当如此。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.original_text: "As soon as we dock on Footfall. That's assuming, of course, that the von Valancius dynasty is committed to serving the Golden Throne... as it should be."

languages.text: «En cuanto atraquemos en Paso. Asumiendo, por supuesto, que la dinastía von Valancius esté comprometida a servir al {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Trono Dorado{/g}... como debería».
languages.original_text: "As soon as we dock on Footfall. That's assuming, of course, that the von Valancius dynasty is committed to serving the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g}... as it should be."

traits.locale_text: «En cuanto atraquemos en Paso. Asumiendo, por supuesto, que la dinastía von Valancius esté comprometida a servir al {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Trono Dorado{/g}... como debería».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「フットフォールに入港したらすぐにだ。もちろん、フォン・ヴァランシウス王朝が{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}黄金の玉座{/g}への奉仕に尽力していることが前提だが…」
languages.original_text: "As soon as we dock on Footfall. That's assuming, of course, that the von Valancius dynasty is committed to serving the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g}... as it should be."

traits.locale_text: 「フットフォールに入港したらすぐにだ。もちろん、フォン・ヴァランシウス王朝が{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}黄金の玉座{/g}への奉仕に尽力していることが前提だが…」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Sobald wir auf Footfall andocken. Was natürlich voraussetzt, dass die Valancius-Dynastie sich dem Dienst am {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Goldenen Thronverschrieben{/g} hat ... Wie sie es sollte."
languages.original_text: "As soon as we dock on Footfall. That's assuming, of course, that the von Valancius dynasty is committed to serving the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g}... as it should be."

traits.locale_text: "Sobald wir auf Footfall andocken. Was natürlich voraussetzt, dass die Valancius-Dynastie sich dem Dienst am {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Goldenen Thron{/g}verschrieben hat ... Wie sie es sollte."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Dès que nous aurons atterri à Castel. Cela ne vaudra, bien sûr, que si la dynastie von Valancius s'engage à servir le {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Trône d'Or{/g}... comme il se doit. »
languages.original_text: "As soon as we dock on Footfall. That's assuming, of course, that the von Valancius dynasty is committed to serving the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g}... as it should be."

traits.locale_text: « Dès que nous aurons atterri à Castel. Cela ne vaudra, bien sûr, que si la dynastie von Valancius s'engage à servir le {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Trône d'Or{/g}... comme il se doit. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Binliman'a yanaşalım, derhâl. Tabii... Olması gerektiği gibi von Valancius hanedanlığının {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Altın Taht'a{/g} adanacağını varsayıyorum..."
languages.original_text: "As soon as we dock on Footfall. That's assuming, of course, that the von Valancius dynasty is committed to serving the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g}... as it should be."
